name: Desert Delivery (del1an)
description:
Summary

The action takes place in a desert enviroment and your task is to supply people with different goods, make sure you don't lose any of these during the transport.

If you're lost in the desert, look for the radio tower to find your way back to the gas station

Controls

WASD - Movement
Spacerbar - Handbrake
E - Accept missions (you must be under the gas station) 

It supports both keyboard and gamepad
